response.website: Youâ€™re visiting the homepage of ABC News, a prominent news and media website.
response.summary: ABC News is a well-established and comprehensive news platform that provides the latest news and headlines from Australia and around the globe. It covers a broad spectrum of topics including politics, business, entertainment, sports, science, and health. The website is designed to deliver timely, accurate, and in-depth news coverage to keep the public well-informed about current events and important issues. Whether you are looking for breaking news, detailed reports, or expert analysis, ABC News aims to be your go-to source for reliable information. The site is user-friendly and structured to help you easily navigate through various sections and find the news that matters most to you.

navigation_menu.description: You can navigate to the homepage of ABC News, where the latest headlines and top stories are featured.
Here, you can read the latest breaking news and updates as they happen.
Find the most recent updates and news about the Coronavirus pandemic, including health advice and government policies.
Stay informed about international news and global events, covering various regions and countries.
You can read the latest business news, financial updates, market trends, and economic analyses.
Find the latest sports news, scores, and updates from various sports leagues and events.
Stay updated on political news, including election coverage, policy changes, and political analysis.
You can read news and updates on health-related topics, including medical research, health policies, and wellness tips.
Explore the latest news in science and technology, including discoveries, innovations, and scientific research.
Verify the accuracy of news and claims with in-depth fact-checking and analysis.
Stay informed about environmental news, issues, and initiatives aimed at protecting the planet.
Explore more sections and topics on ABC News, including lifestyle, culture, and opinion pieces.
